trends: There have been 68 other sightings in Charlotte
There were no other sightings in Charlotte on or around September 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 8:40pm I drove in to my driveway and got out of my car, I walk to my mailbox and started going through my mails, after i was done I look up to the clear night sky looking at the stars and there was no a moon that night it was a clear warm night, as I am looking up to the sky I saw a small green sphere to my right view thinking it was a star but i see it was moving at slow speed heading north, it was getting bigger as it was closer to my center view, no noise no stroking lights, them suddenly it made an L turn to the east, it made the very sharp turn with out stopping nor slowing down and gaining speed and then it just vanish, i do not know if it vanish or gain so much speed in that short distant heading tour the sky the i lost sight of it, after seeing that i got nerves and could not comprehend, it was a perfect sphere,( sorry i did not have a video phone to get photos ) i was in in a slow and al this happen in less then a minute.
